task.summary: Template tab message with gridview and cardview
Update layout, create scan devices with fixbug
Update layout, create login layout with get MAC address, check login, asyncTask
Update layout, create register layout with get MAC address, check register, asyncTask
Update layout, create content message and compose message layout. Click select item in RecycleView
Update layout. Create Floating Button Acion Menu
Create SQLite Database and JSON structure. Implement class HomeMMSDatabaseHelper *fetch all, one user and user *fetch all, one, update (status), delete message
Implement selected item on recycleview with cardview, show message is selected
Update layout intro when first start app.
